TopicTitle: Cannot jump on EVA during time warp

Articles.Content:
• During EVA start walking
  • increase timewarp (Kerbal keeps on walking)
  • press button for jump

-> jumping not possible, Kerbal stops and also moving is not possible anymore until you stop time warp
